creator: mahendra.gharpuray@gxs.ge.com
text:
I came across an unusual error. I have created a JMS appender of my own and it 
processes appender parameters from the configuration file. While running this 
appender in JDK1.2.2, it executes the set methods for these parameters in the 
order specified in the configuration file. In JDK 1.3, this order is not 
followed. It seems to execute the sets on parameters in some arbitrary order. I 
have written code to do some significant processing after processing the last 
parameter, but since they are executed in arbitrary order, my code is failing.

creator: ceki@apache.org
text:
Mahendra,

That is the reason for the activateOptions method. Please check it out.
